nodes.text: Star Wars: Dark Times Gallery Edition

The Star Wars: Dark Times Gallery Edition is a 240-page hardcover collection of Dark Horse's Star Wars: Dark Times comic book series, written by Randy Stradley and illustrated by Douglas Wheatley. The Gallery Edition reprints the series' first five issues in black-and-white, reproducing Wheatley's original pencil artwork at full size, and also includes Stradley's complete script pages for each issue. It was first available for direct order on November 5, 2014, and appeared in bookstores beginning November 18.
